languages.text: "Особенности {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}имперских{/g} традиций. "Лорд-капитан" — священный титул, закрепленный в анналах {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Лекс Империалис{/g} с самого появления Вольных Торговцев на службе Бога-Императора, и не подлежит каким-либо изменениям".

traits.locale_text: "Особенности имперских традиций. "Лорд-капитан" — священный титул, закрепленный в анналах Лекс Империалис с самого появления Вольных Торговцев на службе Бога-Императора, и не подлежит каким-либо изменениям".

languages.text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."
languages.original_text: "Особенности {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}имперских{/g} традиций. "Лорд-капитан" — священный титул, закрепленный в анналах {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Лекс Империалис{/g} с самого появления Вольных Торговцев на службе Бога-Императора, и не подлежит каким-либо изменениям".

traits.locale_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the Lex Imperialis at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

"Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the Lex Imperialis at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

"Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

"Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

"Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

languages.text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的传统就是如此。早在{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}帝国法典{/g}确立，第一批行商浪人加入神皇的麾下时，‘领主舰长’这个头衔就被正式记录在了法典之上。因此，这个称号是神圣不可侵犯的。”
languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

traits.locale_text: “{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的传统就是如此。早在{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}帝国法典{/g}确立，第一批行商浪人加入神皇的麾下时，‘领主舰长’这个头衔就被正式记录在了法典之上。因此，这个称号是神圣不可侵犯的。”

languages.text: «Tales son las tradiciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Capitán es el título establecido en los anales de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} en la época en la que el primer Comerciante Independiente entró al servicio del Dios Emperador, y, por tanto, es sacrosanto».
languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

traits.locale_text: «Tales son las tradiciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Capitán es el título establecido en los anales de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} en la época en la que el primer Comerciante Independiente entró al servicio del Dios Emperador, y, por tanto, es sacrosanto».

languages.text: 「これが{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の伝統というものです。ロード・キャプテンは、最初の自由開拓者たちが神帝陛下に仕えた当時、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア{/g}の年代記で確立された称号であり、したがってそれは神聖なものなのです」
languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

traits.locale_text: 「これが{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の伝統だ。ロード・キャプテンは、最初のローグトレーダーたちが神帝陛下に仕えた当時、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア{/g}の年代記で確立された称号であり、したがってそれは神聖なものだ」
「これが{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の伝統というものです。ロード・キャプテンは、最初の自由開拓者たちが神帝陛下に仕えた当時、{g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}レックス・インペリア{/g}の年代記で確立された称号であり、したがってそれは神聖なものなのです」

languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the Imperium. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the Lex Imperialis at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

languages.text: « Les traditions de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} sont ainsi faites. Le titre de seigneur-capitaine a été instauré dans les annales de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} à l'époque où les premiers libres-marchands sont entrés au service de l'Empereur-Dieu. Il est donc sacrosaint. »
languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

traits.locale_text: « Les traditions de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} sont ainsi faites. Le titre de seigneur-capitaine a été instauré dans les annales de la {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} à l'époque où les premiers libres-marchands sont entrés au service de l'Empereur-Dieu. Il est donc sacrosaint. »

languages.text: "So verlangt es die Tradition des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Lord Captain wurde als Titel in den Annalen der {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperia{/g} niedergelegt, als der erste Freihändler in den Dienst des Gottimperators trat, und ist damit sakrosankt."
languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

traits.locale_text: "So verlangt es die Tradition des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}. Lord Captain wurde als Titel in den Annalen der {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperia}Lex Imperia{/g} niedergelegt, als der erste Freihändler in den Dienst des Gottimperators trat, und ist damit sakrosankt."

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} gelenekleri böyledir. Lord Kaptan, ilk Hür Tacir Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetine girdiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex İmperialis'in{/g} kayıtlarına giren ünvandır. Bu nedenle de pek kutsidir."
languages.original_text: "Such are the traditions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Lord Captain is the title that was established in the annals of the {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g} at the time when the first Rogue Traders entered the God-Emperor's service, and therefore it is sacrosanct."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un gelenekleri böyledir. Lord Kaptan, ilk Hür Tacir Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetine girdiğinde {g|Encyclopedia:LexImperialis}Lex Imperialis{/g}'in kayıtlarına giren ünvandır. Bu nedenle de pek kutsidir."
